response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which I believe would greatly benefit and enhance your business operations. Given its value and potential impact on your endeavors, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $10,500. This special offer is tailored to recognize your discerning taste for quality and innovation. I trust that this product will not only meet but exceed your expectations. Should you have any questions or require further details, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the opportunity to serve you.", "product_price": 10500}
